ClassDesc: this class extends InstrumentationTestCase but should extend AndroidTestCase. Use ProviderTestCase2, which corrects this problem, instead. If you would like to test a single content provider with an @B_android#test#InstrumentationTestCase_E@, this provides some of the boiler plate in @B_android#test#ProviderTestCase#setUp_E@ and @B_android#test#ProviderTestCase#tearDown_E@.
